result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin J. Wright was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

ADDRESS INFO for Justin J. Wright
Current: 609 5th Street, Box 63, Marathon, WI 54448 United States  (Effective: 02-08-2017)
Prior: 909 4th St, # 4, Marathon City, WI 54448
Amended

Defendant Justin J. Wright in court with attorney Tina M Abernethy-Mays.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Called @ 9:08 a.m. Agreement stated - Amended information filed. State moves to dismiss and read in ct 1. Def will plead to ct 2 misd bail jumping, withheld sentence, 1 yr probation, costs, restitution $1276 joint & several w/Brittany Schroeder. Atty Abernethy-Mays and Def agree. Copy of amended information received. Reading waived. Plea quest. reviewed. Plea to ct 2 - no contest. Court grants motion to dismiss and read in ct 1. Constitutional rights, elements, possible penalties reviewed. Atty Abernethy-Mays satisfied. Court finds Def understands and plea freely & voluntarily made. Factual basis. Court accepts plea and finds guilty of ct 2 misd bail jumping. Sentencing remarks by Counsel. Nothing by Defendant. Remarks by the Court. Will follow agreement. Sentence withheld, 1 yr probation, court costs, no DNA sample or surcharge ordered based on offense date. Restitution $1276 joint & several w/Brittany Schroeder. No credit if revoked.   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered, without further order of the court, against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt. Postconviction rights. State has complied with victim's rights. Probation may be transferred to Marathon Co. Discussion regarding early discharge if restitution paid. Court will allow at discretion of agent.
Plea/sentencing hearing on February 8, 2017 at 09:00 am.
